title: ST_PointM
description: Constructs a Point with an M (measure) coordinate from X, Y, and M values.
kernels:
  - returns: geometry
    args:
    - name: x
      type: double
    - name: y
      type: double
    - name: m
      type: double
---

## Examples

```sql
SELECT ST_PointM(-64.36, 45.09, 50.0);
```
